properties.address: Christ Church Hall, Stirlingshire, Stirlingshire FK1 1RX
properties.description: Open every Wednesday from 1-3pm in our bright, warm Hall. Home made soup, chat, games, crafts and more.
properties.title: Christ Church, Falkirk

properties.description: Come and join us, bring your knitting if you like. Enjoy home made soup, a bite to eat, and endless cuppas. Scrabble, Monopoly, jigsaws etc available as well.
properties.title: Craft & Games Cafe

properties.description: Snowdrop Cafe meets every Monday from 1pm to 3pm. We have activities or entertainment twice in the month. There is always time to chat together over a freshly made scone, biscuits and endless cuppas. Dominoes and board games are always available as well. When you come along, you will find a friendly welcome and plenty of folks to chat to. The objective of the Snowdrop Café is simply to provide a space to make friendships, enjoy each other’s company, help with isolation and form a sense of belonging. The aim is to bring people of all age groups together in an inclusive and friendly environment where all will be respected and accepted
properties.title: Snowdrop Cafe

properties.address: The Green, Brook St., Alva, Clackmannanshire
properties.description: Join us for tea or coffee and toast. Enjoy the heat and conversation.
properties.title: Toast Club
